name: Cops!
description:
Getaway from the cops as fast as you can. Gather the money left on the ground in your getaway car. Gather money to buy better, faster getaway cars to run from the police. Make the police cars crash into each other to gain extra points and get the cops off your tail.

How to Play:
• Simple, 1 finger game - use your finger to turn the wheel and guide your getaway car in a safe direction
• Avoid the cops!
• Gather money to unlock better cars

Features:
• Infinite gameplay ( If you can last! )
• High Scores - Compare with your friends
• Coins to unlock 12 Cars!
• Share to social media - Show everyone how good you are at evading the cops!
• Free to Play!
